snippet: The White House will propose a 0.5 percent pay raise for civilian federal employees in the 2013 budget, an administration official said on Friday.
abstract: The White House will propose a 0.5 percent pay raise for civilian federal employees in the 2013 budget, an administration official said on Friday.
lead_paragraph: The White House will propose a 0.5 percent pay raise for civilian federal employees in the 2013 budget, an administration official said on Friday.

headline.main: White House to Propose Pay Raise for Federal Workers
